entry.summary: Re @Gemini 3/5 Here is how trading $DPI will work 👇 1️⃣ Will open on Gemini’s API/FIX and ActiveTrader applications for USD trading pairs 2️⃣ Available on Gemini’s mobile app and website on a rolling, token-by-token basis for USD, GBP, EUR, and CAD pairs

entry.title: Re @Gemini 2/5 .$DPI token has been listed on Gemini exchange today and will be available for trading on the platform soon 🙌 To deposit, click “tr...
entry.summary: Re @Gemini 2/5 .$DPI token has been listed on Gemini exchange today and will be available for trading on the platform soon 🙌 To deposit, click “transfer” then “deposit into Gemini” and pick DPI from the drop-down menu Reminder: It is only possible to deposit DPI on Ethereum’s mainnet 😉
